name: Morbius Anniversary Edition
description:
MORBIUS RETURNS 1 YEAR LATER - WILL HE BE ABLE TO MORB?

Embark on an epic RPG adventure with Morbius and his wacky, zany friends, and defeat a conspiracy beyond morbtal comprehension!

It is highly encouraged that you explore the map as much as you can, and make multiple saves.

Bugs may be present because this project was solely developed by yours truly, a deranged and highly morbheaded individual who vowed to commemorate one of the movies of all time's anniversary by making a Morbius game a reality.

The system: 

SP restores every turn, and guarding also restores SP. Will put that in the game as well.

Make sure to save often, and in different slots! Otherwise you can get softlocked, as the game can be quite tough and you can't escape encounters!

Enjoy the game, morbesties!!!

NOTES: BUGS EXIST

Party add flags have no self switches - minor bug

 The player can sequence break the game just by going up because the path isn't blocked off by any switch!!! Go RIGHT after getting Martine.

Martine Do NOT go up before getting the Trap Smasher! GO EAST!

IT'LL BE FIXED TIMELY! I just need a lil bit of a break, worked for pretty much 20 hours straight  on this stuff yesterday to meet the birthday deadline.
